11431.content:
You sighed as you got home, placing your bag down on the counter, you sat down on the couch and flipped the TV on. Scrolling through the channels you came across your favorite group of channels, the cartoon channels. Many people would probably scoff or laugh if they knew that you were still interested in cartoons, but they had been a major part of your childhood and you weren't about to stop watching them just because they weren't "cool" or they were "kiddy". Surfing around you were found an old favorite Tiny Toon Adventures, each of the characters had their own quirks and charms and it was as much the interaction of the characters, that drew you to the show as it was the comedy. Watching for a few minutes something seemed slightly off about the show, it seemed more colorful than it normally was and you swear whenever Gogo was in the shot he was looking at you.

Dismissing this fact you were able to watch the whole episode uninterrupted, and just as it happens sometimes Gogo appeared at the end of the episode to perform the outro. Yet instead of pulling out a remote, the little dodo reached forward, you barely had time to let out a cry of surprise as the logic defying dodo reached out of the TV, grabbed you by the shirt and yanked you inside. All you knew after that was the crazy little dodo was nowhere to be seen as you were falling through what could easily be known as a druggie's kaleidoscope, you saw all sorts of shapes and colors but none of them seemed to make sense.

Without warning, nor rhyme or reason you were suddenly spat out of...whatever it was you had just been in and you found yourself face down on something made of glass, the only reason you can say that is you can see something underneath the glass, it looked like carpet but it also looked strangely far away. Groaning while sitting up you take a couple seconds to take stock of what just happened, Gogo from Tiny Toons had just snatched you from your living room and had you deposited, where? Taking a few seconds to look around, you found that you were still in a living room, except something was very wrong. The living room wasn't that strange, a couch, a love seat, and a coffee table all facing a large flat screen television. These things weren't that strange, the strange thing was you, or rather how big everything seemed to be in comparison to you.

You had only a few seconds to make these observations before you heard something, it sounded like a soft clicking, that quickly increased in volume to a loud clacking. The problem wasn't the sound, the problem was the pattern of the sounds, as the clacking was happening in the same rhythm as footstep. Looking around you were kind of shit out of luck as the only furniture that had anywhere to hide was more than far enough that you knew you couldn't reach it by jumping. So you did the only thing you could do and watched the couch, as that was the direction the sound was coming from.

In about half a minute the clacking stopped as something made a little hop over the couch and landed, sideways upon it. What you saw made your jaw drop, it was Fifi Le Fume, at least, you think it was her. Same hairstyle that covered one eye, same pink bow in her hair, same purple and white fur design, but there were a few notable differences from the normal FiFi. For starters her tail had...shrunk, it was still a very large bushy tail, but it wasn't twice the skunette's size. Fifi herself seemed different, she looked much more like a woman as compared to a skunk. She wasn't overly busty, but there was more than enough for the skunkette to have cleavage. She also had as shown by the revealing nature of her outfit, a quite nice pair of hips.

The other thing of note was that the skunkette was clothed, equally interesting was what she was wearing. Fifi was adorned in a french maid outfit, that was quite tight on her body, it had everything, including garters and a little frilly black collar for her neck. Fifi also had what looked to be black high-heels on, and she was holding a black feather duster in her hand. With a sigh, the skunkette reached forward and dropped the feather duster onto the table, she seemed completely oblivious of your presence, which at the moment you were not sure was a good or bad thing. "Mon dieu" she sighed, her body visibly relaxing as she laid out across the couch. "Zhis spring cleaning it iz so difficult, still I cannot appear as ze slob for when I bring somebody home." You watched as she searched around with one hand, presumably for the remote to her television, before pulling it out of the seats, again looking right over you she focused her attention on the TV and with a flick of her wrist turned it on.

She got comfy in the couch, strangely enough she didn't take off the maid outfit, this leading you to wonder if she wore the thing because she was cleaning or because she thought it would actually make a good outfit. Not sure if you wanted to make contact with her just yet you sat perfectly still and tried to piece together what had happened to you in the last minute. You had just been at home watching TV, when Gogo popped out of the TV and pulled you in, you then found yourself shrunken in what you assume to be Fifi's home as she seemed pretty comfortable on that couch. Now you've run into Fifi herself, looking quite different from the show, and quite good you had to admit, in a French maid outfit. You couldn't help but groan as the weight of everything settled upon your mind, "god I need a drink right now, or some semblance of reality, the latter more than the former" you think.

What you weren't expecting was your sigh to apparently be of normal volume, as you raised your head you saw Fifi looking around the room confusedly "I swear I just heard somebody sigh, but I cannot see anyone" she said after a few second of looking around. What you weren't expecting was for her to suddenly throw herself over the back of the couch giving you a quite good view of her backside "Ello, is somebody playing ze trick on me?" she says, her voice somehow slightly muffled even though it shouldn't have. She pulled herself back onto the couch and with a shrug sat back down and returned to watching TV. With a loud internal sigh you aren't sure if you just dodged a bullet or not. However this cemented one thing, you either needed to stay under Fifi's radar or you needed to make contact with her.

Fifi always seemed like a nice character so you were sure if you just talked out what happened to you she'd be understanding. Although at the same time, there was that small angry rant she went on in "Prom-ise her anything." Anyway, you really would rather not have that fury directed at you. You just stared up at the oblivious skunkette, you had to make a choice soon as the longer the longer you stayed hidden, the harder it would be to get her help. You thought for a few seconds, weighing the pros and cons of each idea, you decided that the best course of action would be to.....

114311.content:
There were some definite pros to staying under Fifi's radar, but being accidentally or purposely squished because she thought you were a bug was more than enough to convince you that getting her attention was a good idea. Taking a few seconds and a few deep breaths to cam yourself you prepared to make contact with Fifi. Walking to the center of the coffee table you took one final deep breath and cleared your throat. The effect was instantaneous, Fifi's head turning and looking for the sound, "down on the coffee table" you called. Admittedly you should have expected what happened next as Fifi was a cartoon but you didn't, and you couldn't help but jump a little as her eyes locked onto you as soon as that sentence left your mouth.

Leaning forward so her elbows were rested on the coffee table Fifi seemed to study you for a few seconds before asking "you are ze little man, no?" You were confused as to what exactly she mean so the only answer you could give was a hesitant "yes."

You took a second to just examine Fifi "up close" as she hadn't pulled back yet, her fur seeming much finer and silkier than it appeared in the cartoon. Clearing your throat again you continue "I apologize for, intruding on your home, I was just watching TV at home when this weird green dodo popped out of my TV and pulled me in, next thing I knew I was here" you emphasize the end of your statement with a sweep of your arms. Sitting back up, Fifi seemed to think before coming to a conclusion "you are talking about monsieur Gogo, no?" she ask.

"Yes?" You reply hesitantly, you knew it was Gogo but she didn't need to know that. Nodding Fifi continued "so if you were grabbed by monsieur Gogo you could have ended up anywhere in ze Acme Acres, but you ended up with me, do you know what zhis means?" She says seeming to grow more and more excited as she continued. Before you could come up with an answer, Fifi swept you up so you were now sitting in her open palms, Fifi smiled down at you her eyes half-lidded her voice almost a whisper as she continued "zhis is destiny, mon petite amour, zhere is no other way to explain why vous ended up with moi." You had a few other ways you could explain it, but Fifi seemed happy and that was more than likely good for you, so you weren't going to question it.

You slowly nodded and Fifi seemed elated that you were agreeing with her, however in a second you saw her visibly deflate as she seemed to make some sort of horrible, earth-shattering realization, whatever it was nearly bringing the skunkette to tears. Taking a second to compose herself she stared at you again but compared to earlier she was much more reserved and you swear there was a hint of fear in her expression and voice "mon petite, how do you feel about...skunks?" Fifi asks.

The question was not exactly out of left-field, you knew Fifi had been burned more than enough times to be a bit doubtful about any romantic conquests she wished to attempt. "I don't think there's anything wrong with skunks" you replied.

"So...you do not think they are horrible creatures not worthy of being loved?" she asked. "No" you replied honestly, a little pissed that the rejections had deflated Fifi's self-esteem so much. You saw a relieved smile slowly spread across Fifi's face before she took in a large breath of air "mon petite I have, ze confession to make" she said.

"You're a skunk" you reply in the most deadpan voice you can muster.

Fifi seemed to freeze for a second "how did you know?" she asks.

"Your tail and your purple and white fur pattern" you replied.

Taking a second to look herself over Fifi sighed, "I am sorry about zhis mon petite, it is just that no boy will come near me."

You couldn't help but let out a soft sigh, "I'm sorry miss but I haven't gotten your name" you reply hoping to distract her a bit.

Fifi simply stared at you like a deer in the headlights before letting out a small laugh "I apologize mon petite, I am Fifi, Fifi le Fume" she replied slowly returning back to her usual happy and slightly bubbly self. Smiling you couldn't help but give Fifi's confidence a bit of a boost after what you just heard. "Fifi I don't know about all those other guys, but I don't see any reason why any intelligent guy wouldn't want to be near you, you're sweet, gentle and beautiful" you felt your cheeks redden as you said the last bit. You gave Fifi your best smile hoping she'd see the sincerity in your words. The effect was a lot more pronounced that what you were expecting as suddenly you were barraged by kisses for a good half minute, when Fifi finally let up you swear her tail was wagging happily behind her like a dog. You were a little caught off guard as you felt one of Fifi's fingers stroke over your back and she once again stared down at you her eyes half-lidded and a small smile on her lips. "So, mon petite how about we go upstairs and I can get into something a leetle more...comfortable" she says.

You couldn't really do anything else but nod at this suggestion and Fifi let out a simple giggle before pressing you to her bosom and starting to walk. You had to admit, the soft fur underneath you felt heavenly and you could hear Fifi happily humming a tune above you. It only took about half a minute for Fifi to reach her bedroom and you were gently lifted off her bosom and placed down upon a quite large bed, shaped like a heart. Looking around you noticed a few features of the room, the wall opposite the bedroom door was the closet, the bed had matching nightstands on either side of it, and across from the bed was a makeup table. Looking back towards Fifi you saw something that made your heart stop, while you had been looking around Fifi had managed to strip out of her maid outfit and was now standing there in all her furred glory. Fifi's fur seemed much more fluffy and pronounced without the maid outfit on, this feature being most pronounced upon her breasts. The round well-sized orbs being covered by a thick layer of fluffy fur that made them very inviting, Fifi seemed to notice your gaze and rather than be offended by it she seemed to be very much enjoying the attention.

Slowly Fifi sauntered over to the bed and with a little hop landed upon it, you were quickly scooped up as Fifi moved up to the top of her bed and you were gently deposited back upon her bosom, Fifi seeming more than content to keep you very close as you felt one of her hands wrap around your back and gently press you against her furred orbs. "Mon petite, would you like to be my....boyfriend?" Fifi asks. You had to admit that you were a little confused about this; you had kind of thought with all the talk about destiny that Fifi already considered you her boyfriend, or at least some sort of star-crossed lover. Taking a moment you really couldn't see anything wrong with agreeing, you had been living alone when Gogo grabbed you, and it wasn't exactly every day you got a proposition like this.

Sighing happily you buried yourself in the furred bosom beneath you "I would love to be your boyfriend Fifi" you reply.

"Zhat is wonderful" she replies in almost a whisper, "now...

Your response seemed to have gained a look from Sawyer. "You were on my face, that means you were climbing me right?"

"Only to get your attention" you reply quickly.

"You didn't take any detours did you" Sawyer asked.

"No of course not, I don't want to make you angry"

Sawyer sat down on the couch properly and dropped you off at the table next to it. She leans back as she gets ready. "Ok, tell me everything about what happened to you. How you got shrunk? Why your in my apartment? And how you climbed me?" she seems convinced that you did something inappropriate to her while she was sleeping.

Anyway time to tell your story
11533222222211112.title: Nice Sawyer

115332222222111121.content:
"...and that's it." You said, finishing your story, hoping she'd buy it. You were upfront about her sitting on you and how you climbed over her chest, but swore up and down nothing had happened. You looked up at her face, which was unreadable right now, slowly she sighed as she closed her eyes for a bit and said "Alright." In a matter of fact tone.

"...Alright?"

"Yeah, alright, I guess I can somewhat believe that, at least as much as finding a tiny guy in my house." You silently breathed a sigh of relief as a hand connected to the table next to you, startling you and causing you to jump. "Jeez, calm down kid...go ahead and get on, i'm sure you're probably pretty hungry, right?"

"Oh, um, I wouldn't want to impose..."

Sawyer rolled her eyes. "As if you really could eat me out of house and home at that size, and besides, i'm hungry too and it's been a long day. You say you've been on my couch all day? Well that means you need to eat something, i'm sure you're starved."

Sawyer wasn't wrong. Ever since she had got home you weren't really thinking about it, but you had been hungry for hours and it was something that was getting more and more obvious as time went on. Her bringing it up just made your stomach rumble. You felt yourself go red in the cheeks as Sawyer gave you a knowing smirk. You silently clambered on to her furry hand and sat in it. "Okay, let's go whip up some grub." Sawyer said, lifting you up and letting you down on her shoulder. As she got up from the couch and started walking you grabbed onto her neck just to keep your balance, though tried to be careful not to grab too tight or pinch her. You couldn't see if she reacted to it or not from this angle but she didn't stop or say anything so you assumed it was fine. When she got to her kitchen she set you on the counter.

"I'm making myself a bacon and pickle sandwich. That sound good to you?" Bacon and pickle sandwich? "Um...how about a BLT?" You said, though Sawyer just looked at you confused. "What's a BLT?"

"Well...a bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich..." You said, unsure of how she didn't know what that was, though it probably had to do with the world you were in. Sawyer just shrugged. "Sure, never heard of it but i'll give it a try."

As she fried the bacon you felt your mouth start to water. Her back was to you so you were thankful she couldn't see it. "So, where exactly are you from then?" She said, back still turned. You quickly wiped your sleeve and told her the city you lived in. "Huh...that close to here?"

"Where are we exactly?" You said, responding with a question.

"Hollywood." Wow. You hadn't expected to hear that.

"Hollywood huh? I'm not close to home at all..." You chuckled, then thought of how she hadn't heard of a BLT but lived in Hollywood. Questions upon questions entered your mind, but you kept them to yourself.

"Well that's a shame, though I doubt i'd want to send you on your own on a bus if it were close...hmm, we'll work something out." Sawyer said as she finished up the bacon and started to cut up the veggies and bread. She had made herself a nice sandwich and you...got some bits of bacon, crumbs, lettuce, and tomato, though at this point you weren't complaining. Any food was good. You started to tear into the food as Sawyer brought you a small thimble of water, she looked bemused at the sight of you cramming it all in your mouth. "Jeez, don't choke." She set the thimble down in front of you and sat in a chair next to you. Good lord it was hard to get it out of your mind how big she was.

"Well for now I guess you can sleep here, isn't like I can throw you out." Sawyer said after she had taken a few bites. "This ain't bad. What'd you say it was?"

"A BLT..." The words were automated as you were still processing that Sawyer was going to put you up. "Um...thanks for all this..."

"It's not a problem really, if anything you've been the better part of my day..." Sawyer's mind drifted back to work and that damned orange cat, a scowl started to set in on her face.

"Um...if you say so." You weren't going to press any harder seeing the look on her face.

Once dinner was done she left you a few minutes in her sink with the water running to wash up before she set you on her vanity in her room so she could do the same. After about 20 minutes she came in, changed into some sleepwear and opened a drawer with some silk shirts in it. "Alright, this is where you're sleeping." She plucked you up, much gentler than the first time, and set you down in there and closed it until it was only a crack. "Don't do anything stupid, okay? And have a good night, i'll see you in the morning." At that she gave you a genuine smile and walked away. A few seconds later the lights flicked off and you laid back.

"Hell of a day..." You muttered to yourself as you fell quickly asleep.
115332222222111121.title: Staying with Sawyer

1153322222221111211.content:
You wake up when the entire floor started shifting forward. Your awaken by a bright light and once that light faded away you saw the giant cat from last night glaring down at you. Memories of what happened yesterday flooded back as you remember exactly where you were. Sawyer was dressed in a sophisticated attire.

"You had a good sleep? Mine was pretty good all things supposed." Sawyer said.

"Well I got a little cold in the middle of the night, but besides that I think I've slept pretty well" you reply modestly.

Sawyer begins to look away while thinking "I'm gonna have to get some stuff for you, small things you can sleep in, something you could use as a toilet, etc..."

"Speaker of which Sawyer, I kind of need to go" you say as you can't ignore your morning routine.

Sawyer put a hand to her head and frowned "You have to be kidding me. Fine just hop on and I'll carry you to the toilet" she lowered her hand towards the ground and you climbed on. Once you were in the middle, she lifted you up from the drawer and started walking towards the bathroom. She arrived inside and brought you to the toilet sit, she put you down on the lid and ripped some toilet paper, she then put it next to you.

"Do it quickly, I've got a tight schedule and I don't want to miss work or show up late" Sawyer said as she turned around and started brushing herself up in a mirror.

You dropped your pants and started working. You were close to the edge of the toilet bowl so you really had to risk it. However you successfully did it. Once done you wipe yourself with the blanket sized toilet paper and pushed it in to the toilet. You then pulled up your pants and shouted to Sawyer that you were finished
1153322222221111211.title: Morning With Sawyer

choices: You decide enough is enough and decide to try and leave
You wait it out for Sawyer
Something DOES happen while you're waiting!
11533222222211112111.content:
"I'm finished!" You shouted as Sawyer finished touching herself up. "Alright, alright, coming." She said as she walked over and let you get on her hand. She flushed the toilet and started to consider that she needed a better system than that. "Alright, well, i'd better get going, do you want me to leave you on the couch with the radio on?" She said as she walked towards her main living room. "Wait, you're just going to leave me here?" You didn't want a repeat of yesterday's hunger and endless boredom. "Well i'm not just going to take you to work with me, that'd be insane. What if someone saw you?" She said, giving you a look like she wanted to give a lecture. "All the same, what if I need to go again, what if i'm hungry, what if something happens here? It isn't like i'm impossible to hide, right?" You said, meeting the silent threat of a lecture with your rebuttal.

"Look kid, I don't really have a system worked out for how we're going to handle your...presence yet, but all the same that doesn't mean i'm going to risk both your safety, and my sanity with endless questions about how I came upon you by you getting discovered by someone, i'm leaving you here, and that's that!" She said as she walked towards the couch. "Come on Sawyer, are you that worried that someone will find m-" You were cut off as she unceremoniously dumped you on the couch instead of setting you down, though luckily it was a soft landing, which she must have known. "Do you really think something is going to happen here?" She said, immediately bringing up your previous point with a smug look about her face. You really had no control over your fate at this point and it steamed you off. Sawyer must have noticed because her expression immediately softened and she brought her face down to your level, startling you. "Look, it really is for your own good to stay here, alright, i'll get a carrot and some water out of the fridge and leave it on the couch for you, and i'll leave the radio on. I promise this isn't a permanent solution to this...okay?" She said, before you could reply she got up and walked away. She was back in a few moments with said carrot and thimble of water, as well as an empty thimble which you assumed was for...business. Soon you heard the radio going with...some really old sounding music and you saw Sawyer head for the door. She flashed you a smile. "I'll be back before you know it, and tomorrow is my day off, I promise we'll sort this out then." And she was gone.

...hours had definitely passed at this point. You had eaten some of the carrot, drank a bit of water and just...sat. To be honest the radio was driving you more nutty than keeping you from boredom. You knew Sawyer was probably right, but that didn't make you any less annoyed at the whole thing. Still, what exactly were you going to do about it? Were you going to do anything about it?
11533222222211112111.title: Sawyer heads for work

115332222222111121112.content:
First couple hours you were convinced she would come back quick. After all she had a little human with her, that's the stuff you'd leave work early for. She's going to be back any moment.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------

She's not coming back, you can't believe she's just left you here without anything in boredom. As your host, she should be a lot more accommodating! Rather then being a rude cat and leaving you by yourself!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------

At this point you would be thankful if something were to happen. Maybe. Burglars will bust into Sawyer's house, maybe. A bird will crash through the window. Just anything, anything!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------

What if she doesn't come back. Many hours in and you've started thinking for the worst. What if your left here until you've run out of both water and food. The last thing you'll hear is the songs of the radio, signifying your death.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------

You've accept your peace, you've accepted your life, you've accepted your end. The only thing now is to wait. The final stage. The final Journey. The final moments. The final-"

"I'm Back" Sawyer said as she opened the door once again.

"Sawyer, don't ever leave me alone! Ever!" you yell to her, loving the fact that she's back and she can stop your boredom.

"Geez, you been bored kid?" Sawyer said as she walked into the room and sat down onto the couch next to you.

"Beyond bored" you tell her "In fact I'm pretty sure I was going crazy." you tell her the truth, just being happy she was back.

"Well I was having a bad day as well, I'm going to need to relax first" she says as she gets comfortable on the couch, she looked over towards you and she got an idea. "Hey, since you were bored all day, do you mind doing a job for me?"

"I will literally accepted any job" you say wanting to do something!

What does Sawyer have planned?
115332222222111121112.title: Boredom Without Sawyer

choices: ...and now it was time to sleep
...and now it was time to escape
1153322222221111211121.content:
"Any job huh? Glad to hear it, a foot rub would really be great little guy." As she said that her furred feet landed in front of you, causing you to jump a bit. "Aw jeez, are you sure?" You said. "You did say ANY job." She said, though you couldn't see her face you just knew she was smirking. You wanted to protest some more but figured that if you got this over with then the day would probably immediately take an upswing. You approached her left foot, got ready to...do what? You weren't exactly used to doing this, but you figured you'd try and massage like normal? Would she feel it? You tried this for about a minute before Sawyer interjected. "I can barely feel that kid, you're gonna need to put more into it I think." She said. Thankful that she probably couldn't see your annoyed look you started to put your shoulder into her foot, planting your feet as much as you could into the couch you pushed and shifted your shoulder hard, hoping this would get results. "That's more like it..." She said overhead, thankful that this did it. You continued to do this for a few minutes until she stopped you. "Alright, can you get the other one next?" She asked as she shifted her feet once again. "Yes master..." You mumbled under your breath, sure that she couldn't hear you as you approached her next foot. You did the same as before, and were honestly starting to get tired yourself. This was sapping what little energy you had just being lethargic all day. Thankfully when you were about ready to call it quits yourself Sawyer let you go. "Ah...that's what I needed. Thanks for that." She said as she leaned up and you could see her smiling.

"Yeah...no problem..." You said, obviously winded. "I suppose I owe you a bit of something huh?" She said smirking. "All I ask is that you don't leave me on the loony couch with the radio for a whole day again..." You said, catching your breath. "Was it really THAT bad?" She said, still a bit confused. "Sawyer I swear I heard the same 5 songs 50 times over and my mind went to darker places than i'd like to ever visit." She mused for a second. "Alright, like I said, i'm off tomorrow, we'll figure out a solution to this. I suppose living most of your life on this couch is not something that you want." Wait rest of your life!? Wait what!? "Rest of my life...?" You said, testing the words. "Well...what else can we really do? You don't know what happened to you right, and honestly, if the world found out about you you'd be a sideshow freak at best and a science experiment at worst...you don't want that, and I don't want that for you, so...this is kind of where we're at." She said, much gentler than you expected, she probably sensed the weight of what she was saying and it was all you were thinking about for now, she must have sensed how uncomfortable she made you as she gently picked you up in her hand and brought you to her lips, giving you a quick kiss. This knocked you out of your stupor as you wiped the spit and small amount of lipstick that left you with. "What was THAT for?" You said. "The massage, plus you were zoning out there, I figured it'd bring you back to reality, honestly staying with me won't be so bad kid, just try not to get worked up about it, we won't repeat what happened today." She said. 'This discussion isn't over...' Was what you wanted to say, but you opted to leave it for now. Wasn't much for it at the moment anyways.

The rest of the night proceeded with you and Sawyer enjoying a bit of dinner and her telling you a bit about her job. It was the first time you found out what she actually did, she was the secretary for some talent agent for animal movie actors. She had been having some rough times with another cat named Danny who she described as 'blindly optimistic to the point of clinical stupidity' though the bitterness rang through, she also sounded a bit sad about it too. She asked you a bit about where you were from and you answered honestly, about your life and school, your home and your family. The differences of where you came from were starting to be apparent to both of you, you learned that not only were animals anthropomorphic and intelligent in this world, but that it was also the 1930's, and she learned about you coming from the 2010's as well.

Eventually evening gave way to night and much like the night prior you found yourself in the same drawer.

"What if I have to go?" She gave you an annoyed look at this and said. "You have that toilet paper for a reason." she explained. "But...the smell." She rubbed at her eyes "I'll leave it open a crack. Just...don't get it on my cloths."

"Can do ma'am." She gave you an exasperated look as she shut it until a sliver of the drawer was open.
1153322222221111211121.title: Foot rub for Sawyer

11533222222211112111213.content:
Luckily for you, it didn't take you very long to dose off to sleep. The clothes and underwear you were sleeping on was surprisingly comfortable as you quickly faded into sleep. Sawyer however wasn't having the same luck as she tossed and turned in her bed constantly through the night. She doesn't know why, she's always been able to sleep well on her bed, even if it wasn't the best bed in the world.

Sawyer layed on her back, eyes open and annoyed. She tries thinking of everything that might let her go to sleep. She got some milk, she tried emptying her mind, nothing was working for her however. That was when Sawyer remembered this article she read in the local newspaper. Of how it's much easier to fall alseep when your cuddling someone. Now she doesn't have a significant other to cuddle, but she does have you.

You feel the drawer open as you wake up. You feel a hand wrap around you as you try to comprehend whats happening to you. You feel it all move until it stopped and you were pushed into a fluffy white plain.

"Am I being kidnapped right now?" you say unsure at what's happening.

"Shut up I'm trying to sleep" You heard Sawyer say as you realized that you were being held up to her chest. Just over her bra and her slightly sized breasts.

"Well I was sleeping, until someone woke me up and wanted to cuddle me" you say.

Sawyer didn't respond but instead told you to be quiet by hugging you even closer.

"Duly noted" you manage to get out as Sawyer loosens her hold. Seeing as your still in a comfortable position and Sawyer's fur wasnt annoying at all, you dose off to sleep. And it turns out that newspaper article was accurate. As Sawyer didn't have any much trouble sleeping anymore.

Anyone watching this scene would laugh at sawyer, saying she would need a little doll to fall asleep.

What happens next?

121.title: Sly Cooper

choices: The bedroom door opens, (she might or might not see you)
1211.content:
It had taken you 2 days to do the marathon, only pausing to eat and sleep but you had done it. You had beaten every Sly Cooper game 100% start to finish, damn master thief sprints took you a few hours just by themselves. You yawned a bit as it was getting later, not anything you couldn't handle but it was probably 11:00 at night. You reached for the off switch of your console when suddenly the Cooper gang's logo appeared on the screen with a small message underneath it. "Congratulations you are the master thief, would you like to continue?" it reads.

Now not knowing of any other Sly Cooper games and thinking this must have been programmed in as some sort of extras or lost levels you move the cursor that appeared with your controller and click on the logo, another message popped up "have fun" before the screen flared white. You slowly opened your eyes after the light show disappeared and you just stood there stock still stunned at what you saw. You were on a cobblestone street, probably somewhere in London but that wasn't why you were frozen, you were tiny, you could tell that much. Your suspicion was confirmed as a gigantic brown boot landed right next to you. You looked up, and up and up at the figure now standing above you. The figure above you aside from the boots was wearing blue pants, a blue top covered by a brown jacket as well as yellow gloves. She had a very athletic body. although that didn't detract any from her figure as her chest from your position pushed against the top containing it. Her hips were nice and wide while her stomach was slim. Her red bushy tail flicked behind her sometimes flicking up and meeting the shoulder length blue hair that cascaded down her back and ended in a ponytail.

There was only creature you knew that looked like this and she confirmed it by yelling "Cooper stay where you are, I'm here to arrest you." You weren't sure how but you were under Inspector Carmelita Montya Fox, and you were only a few inches tall, this was just great (sarcasm). Carmelita made to move and you did the one thing you could think of, you latched yourself onto her boot laces. She ran after Sly and you were tossed around and jostled as she ran but finally she stopped and you looked up shaking a fist "I'll get you Cooper" she shouts before lowering the fist and sighing "can't believe I let him get away again" she says sounding honestly kind of defeated. You waited a few moments before letting your presence be known since you knew Carmelita wasn't a bad person just very....lawful. "Excuse me" you say, Carmelita freezes and spins from side to side almost throwing you off, "where are you?" she says looking honestly bewildered. "Down here, on your boot" you reply feeling somewhat nauseous.

Carmelita looks down and almost jumps back as she sees you but thankfully she doesn't jump. You were sure she spotted you as her hand descends over you covering you and you were lifted up in her fist. She opens her fist in front of her face and you were eye to yellow eye with the vixen. "Who are you? what are you? Are you a spy for Cooper?" She says suddenly angry.

"Woah woah, hold on innocent until proven guilty" you say not sure if that would be enough but it pacified her. "Well I'm a human, I'm not a spy or anything I just....showed up here" you say. Every bell and whistle in your body was telling you to run but you knew that was the last thing you do with Carmelita because when you run her she starts using that shock pistol of hers. Carmelita nods and calms down "well since your not a spy for Cooper your just a law-abiding citizen, how can I help you?" she says. "Um.....well I don't really have a place to stay, and well it looks like rain" you say pointing up at the sky which had quickly become overcast during the chase. Carmelita nods again, "until we can find you a place to stay, you may stay with me" she says which honestly suprised you.

Carmelita drops you into a pocket on that jacket of hers that you never saw before and starts walking, it took her 5 minutes to come upon a small Victorian townhouse. She walks right up to the door, pulls a key out from under her top and unlocks the door and enters, it was a very simple house, that much you knew as she walked around, living room attached to a kitchen, there was an upstairs but that probably only contained Inspector Fox's room and a bathroom. Inspector Fox walks through the hall into the living room and flops down on a large plush armchair finally remembering you as she fishes you out of the pocket. "Thank you Inspector Fox" you say as she sets you down on the arm of the chair, she looks at you curious "how did you know who I was" she asks?

"Everyone's heard of you, your almost as famous as Sly Cooper" you say lying through your teeth. She looks at you for a second before nodding "probably known as a failure, I've never been able to catch Sly and his team no matter how hard I try" she says sighing. Trying to change the subject you ask "not to be a bother, but is there anything to eat and drink around here?"

Inspector Fox seems quite happy to have a distraction and she nods "I'll get you something right now" she says. She stands up and heads off to the kitchen and you can soon smell tea and "sniff" "sniff" toast. Carmelita comes back carrying a cup of tea and a buttered piece of toast, she holds the cup of tea over to you and you reach over and take a drink. You had to jump down as she had the plate with toast on it on her lap and you ate a bit of that before heading back to your place on the arm of the chair.

"How did you get so small?" Carmelita asks after taking a sip of tea. You shrug "I have no idea, there's was a flash of light in front of me and then I found myself at this size under you, I grabbed onto your boot as you chased Sly and yeah that's about it" you reply. Carmelita stares at you for a few seconds before sighing, "well that is one interesting story, but i'll believe you as well I did find you attached to my boot" she says. You nodded and you sat there together for a bit before Carmelita stands up "well it is about time we get to bed, you can sleep here" she says indicating the chair.

"Thank you Ms. Fox" you say. Carmelita walks away and despite your better judgment you slowly follow her. Carmelita heads upstairs and given your size it was quite easy to follow her as you gave off no noise and even though she looked over once or twice there was lots of stuff to hide behind. She spent a few minutes in the bathroom and you just waited in a dark corner nearby, although you really weren't sure how good her night vision was so you hid behind a small desk as she exited the bathroom. She walked into the bedroom and you assume she spent a few minutes getting ready for bed, You froze as you heard something, it sounded almost like sniffling, you weren't sure what exactly you could do, I mean Carmelita had been nice enough to let you into her house when you showed up here and you were spying on her.
1211.title: Carmelita Fox

choices: You wake up with a weight on top of you
12112.content:
You look at the bedroom door still hearing that sniffling sound you look at the space between the door frame and the floor and your just able to fit in underneath. You wiggle your way underneath the floor and now you hear Carmelita muttering "again, I let him get away again." You slowly walk up to the bed and shimmy up the side of the bed, you see Carmelita laying on the bed slightly curled up, she was wearing a blue nightie the same colour of her hair.

"Excuse me" you say and she jumps up, turns the lamp on and points the shock pistol right at where you were standing, you held your hands up "sorry, it's just I heard something and came to see what it was" you say only partially lying this time. Carmelita looks at you and sighs "I'm sorry that I kept you up" she says looking away.

"I heard you muttering, is it really that bad that you haven't caught Sly Cooper yet?" you ask.

Carmelita sighs and looks at you "everytime he gets away, I get a pay deduction, but that's not what bothers me, everytime I fail it feels like I failed justice, letting Cooper get away" she says.

You nod "well there are 3 of them right, and only one of you" you say.

She nods "yes he has a turtle and a hippo helping him" she replies. She looks down at you and an idea seems to form in her head "would you like a way to...return the favour for me helping you?" she asks. You look at her and nod slowly and she smiles "good" she says. She reaches over into a drawer and pulls something out, it looked like a police star and she holds it up "I name you my deputy" she says. You were stunned "I....sure that will work" you say unable to think of anything else. Carmelita smiles "good, then get some sleep, we have a lot of work tomorrow" she says. You nod and climb off the bed and head back downstairs.

You lay down in the chair when you reach it and quickly fall asleep. You were shaken awake and you open your eyes to see Carmelita fully dressed and holding a piece of toast in her hand, "here you need to eat and then we need to get going" she says. You eat the part of the toast and she devours the rest before picking you up and dropping you into the jacket pocket. She heads out of the apartment and starts heading towards a car park before you hear a sound and a voice "Carmelita, Cooper has been spotted at the history museum, go there and apprehend him" it crackles. Carmelita turns and starts running toward a large domed building you can only assume is the natural history museum. She reaches the inside of the museum and you see the edge of a black and white tail flash around a corner. "Over there" you shout pointing towards the corner and she runs off after the tail.

You heard a voice "Sly hurry it up, Carmelita is right behind you" the voice says right as he enters your vision. Sly honestly looked like a thief as he was a raccoon and he wore dark blue clothing and carried a cane in the shape of a question mark. Carmelita cornered him in a courtyard and he nodded at Carmelita as he turned and saw her "Inspector Fox, it's wonderful to see you again" he says.

"Cooper, your not getting away this time" she says. Sly raises his hands, "Your right inspector I'm finished" he says as something falls out of his glove and hits the floor. It explodes in a cloud of smoke and Carmelita shouts "Cooper" and fires into the smoke. You were looking around but you couldn't see anything except smoke until you looked up. Running on the roof of the courtyard was Sly, "Carmelita above us" you say tapping her on the shoulder. She looks up and shouts "Cooper" again before holding onto where you were. "There's no way she's gonna" your thought was interrupted as she leaped up spinning in the air and landing behind Sly. "Freeze" she shouts and he turns and smiles well slyly "Inspector Fox your really keeping up" he says smiling obviously he was stalling for something.

"Shoot him don't talk to him" you say and she fires, you can see Sly is totally shocked at her firing as his eyes bulge as the electro-bullet speeds towards him and hits him. He crumples forward just as an rc copter with a rope flies behind him and then flies off. Carmelita walks up and pokes Sly's unmoving body "ringtail?" she says poking him again with her boot. She lifts him up and realizes he's unconcious "I.....I did it, I finally caught Cooper" she says too stunned to really believe anything. You heard that same voice again "Sly are you there, Sly answer me" it says. Carmelita hears it too and picks up what you quickly recognized as the binocucom and smiled at it, "so this is how they relayed all the info" she says. She picks Sly up over her shoulder and you just sat there as she dragged his body to the precint, walked past 10 stunned policeman and placed Sly down into a cell and shut and locked it herself having the sense to remove Sly's cane from his person before putting him in.

"Good job Carmelita" comes a voice from behind her. She turns and you see a dog standing there in a pair of slacks and a cream colored shirt with a large badge on his chest. "Thank you Inspector Barkley" she says smiling at the dog. He looks at the cage "Sly Cooper, I never thought i'd see him locked up, Carmelita your full pay has been reinstated and you may have a few weeks vacation you've earned it" he says. Carmelita just stands there stunned "thank you sir" she says. She walks out of the police station with a large sense of pride.

"That's nice you get a vacation" you say looking up at her from in the pocket. Carmelita freezes obviously forgetting you were even there. She runs home and opens her pocket pulling you out and placing you down on the floor. She looks down at you and smiles "thank you" she says the smile growing larger.

"For what?" you reply honestly not thinking you did anything.

"You helped me catch the most wanted criminal in the world, Sly is always able to trick me be it by running away or by sweet-talking me, so this capture is partly because of you" Carmelita says. You just shrugged honestly not seeing it as big a deal as she was seeing it. Carmelita looked down at you "is there any way I can repay you?" she asks.

"You could let me keep living here, but otherwise I really can't think of anything" you say. Carmelita nods and you spent the rest of the day just really hanging out, as it got later Carmelita smiled, "I need you to stay here for a bit" she says pointing to the chair, "no following me like you did before" she says. You froze "she knew, oh crap" you think.

"Sorry, about following you" you say. She nods and stares at you "I'll accept that apology" she says before heading upstairs. You waited on the chair for a good ten minutes till you heard something and into view walks Carmelita in that same black dress she wore in Sly 2 and her hair pinned up in the same fashion. She smiles at you as you were well somewhat gaping "I'll take that as my partner approves" she says and you bashfully nod. She lowers a hand and you step on and she hides you up in the bun in her hair. She walks out and you spend the next half hour at a fancy resturant although you had to stay hidden in her hair so you didn't really get to eat much. When she got back to her house she let you out and sighed "well I think it's about time for bed" she says. You nod and she starts walking upstairs "Carmelita shouldn't you uh, let me down so I can go sleep on the chair" you say. She doesn't answer instead entering the bedroom she puts you down on a pillow and pushes you forward telling you that you were supposed to keep your face buried. You did so and you heard her undress and then redress herself and you felt a tap on your back. Turning over you see Carmelita's face and body as she's wearing that same blue nightie and she smiles at you "good night" she says turning over. You looked at her somewhat stunned but think "aw screw it this is better then the chair" curl up and fall asleep.

There was a computer with an Egg chair, a flatscreen TV with some bean bag chairs around it, and a large bed. There was also some dressers, one of which was beside a door. "No way..." You uttered as you stood up and began to walk around.

You thought about what to do.

info.brief_description: What if you shrunk in front of Sally Acorn, Jenny from Bucky O Hare, or Lola Bunny?
info.description:
Okay so this is how it works. First choose a videogame/cartoon/etc. Then select the anthro female character of your preference. Then, write what you want to write with them. You're already small enough to fit into their hands once you make your choices. However when writing try to make them stick a bit in character as well as try to be descriptive. Not saying there's anything wrong with OOC, but a bit of effort to keep characters a little in character can go a long way. Also leave options open for others who may not like the route you take with the story.

I also would like to inform that crappy chapters that are way too short or that contain horrid grammar will not be accepted.

I'll allow everything except:

- Fart/scat/pee/toilet
- Bad smells/odor
- Guro
- Male giants obviously.

Finally try not to give yourself a name when writing as that takes you out of the story. When writing try to use "You ran for cover" and such to keep the perspective as rather anonymous.

That said have fun.
info.pretty_title: Shrunk Around your Favorite Anthro Chick
